changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.37

### Sport Section Fullscreen Fix
- Fixed: Channels now open directly in fullscreen from Sport section (no preview)
- Fixed: Channel switching UP/DOWN uses complete TV channel list
- Fixed: Back from fullscreen returns to Sport with focus restored
- Fixed: No preview when entering or exiting fullscreen from Sport

### Delta Sync (unchanged - already working)
- Hash-based change detection (instant if no changes)
- Only updates added/removed/modified channels
- Preserves favorites and watch progress

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.36: Sync performance improvements
